column1: Income and Poverty Rates by Sex, statistical indicator and Year

Mean Real Household Disposable Income, Median Equivalised Real

Deprivation Rate: An individual is defined as being deprived if they
experience two or more forms of enforced deprivation

Disposable Incomes are averaged over households WHILE Median
Equivalised Real, Mean Equivalised Real, Median Equivalised Nominal
and Mean Equivalised Nominal Disposable Incomes are averaged over

and Highest Level of Education Completed  refers to that of the head
